s2.ptxt: Using a snap ring expander, install a new steering main shaft snap ring (inner side) to the steering main shaft.
Install the steering main shaft to the steering column tube.
Using a snap ring expander, install a new steering main shaft snap ring (outer side).
Using SST and a hammer, tap in a new bearing.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL KEY INTERLOCK SOLENOID (for Automatic Transmission)

s2.ptxt: Install the solenoid to the steering column upper bracket with the 2 screws.
Install the switch to the steering column upper bracket with the 2 claws.
Install the switch to the steering column upper bracket with the 2 claws.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL IGNITION SWITCH LOCK CYLINDER ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Make sure that the lock cylinder is on ACC.
Install the ignition switch lock cylinder.
Check that the steering lock mechanism is activated when the key is removed.
Check that the steering lock mechanism is deactivated when the key is inserted and turned to the ACC position.
If there is any abnormality, replace the ignition switch lock cylinder assembly.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL STEERING COLUMN UPPER WITH SWITCH BRACKET ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Install the steering column upper bracket and steering column upper clamp with 2 new tapered-head bolts.
Tighten the 2 tapered-head bolts until the bolt heads break off.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL KEY CYLINDER LIGHT ASSEMBLY (w/ Key Cylinder Light)

s2.ptxt: Align the key cylinder light with the installation position of the upper bracket.
Push up the key cylinder light and connect it to the upper bracket.

atten3.ptxt: Do not apply excessive force to the key cylinder light as it may be damaged.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL NO. 2 STEERING INTERMEDIATE SHAFT SUB-ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Align the matchmarks on the steering intermediate shaft and steering link.
Install the steering intermediate shaft to the steering link with the bolt.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL STEERING SLIDING WITH COUPLING YOKE SUB-ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Align the matchmarks on the yoke and steering main shaft.
Install the steering yoke with the bolt.
